general.description: Like Mars, Venus was settled before the invention of faster-than-life travel. Today, this unforgiving world is home to the underclass of the Solar System, sheltering from the harsh surface conditions in underground cities.
general.bar: The "Amtor" bar is filled with nervous-looking bourgeois from Terra and Luna looking for an "adventure". Luckily for them, the "Amtor" is as safe as it goes on Venus.
